resources.string: We welcome you to the economic game "Lucky Ticket to the Future". This game is designed so that each of you can learn how to wisely distribute your funds. At the moment, the game implies a team character, later individual.\n \n A little about the game: At the beginning of the game, each team is awarded a starting capital of 20,000 monetary units (hereinafter m.u.), which they distribute among eight (8) possible investment instruments.
